page.shortlink: api a5 chart data url generate function
page.description: Generates the google URL for a chart for embedded chart object
page.prototype: C Result = a5_chart_data_url_generate(P objSettings ,P customChart ,N width ,N height )

argument.name: C Result =
argument.description: Generated REST URI string to pass to the chart provider, typically the Charting::Chart Class

argument.name: customChart
argument.description: A Charting::ChartDataDefinition object or, often, a function that returns a Charting::ChartDataDefinition

argument.name: width
argument.description: The desired width of the chart in pixels

argument.name: height
argument.description: The desired height of the chart in pixels. Numeric

page.discussion: Generates the URI string that describes a chart for an embedded chart object. This string can be used by the .NET Framework System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart class via the Alpha Five Charting::Chart Class discussed as part of the Chart API V11..
page.example: dim objSettings as Reporting::ReportChart objSettings.chartType = "Pie" dim uri as c = a5_chart_data_url_generate(objSettings,PieChart((,500,300(
